A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Where to start?  Luke goes out like a BITCH. Only two lessons out of three given to Rae. The primary plot was weak\, the secondary plot was worse. Snoke is and will forever be a mystery to us all.  They continue killing off our favorite characters while force feeding us new ones whom are dull and uninteresting. Did I mention Luke goes out like a bitch?  Terrible film.  Two stars\, if only because it's a Star Wars film..
